EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Microservices with Spring Boot 7AM.Reminder 9/12
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Microservices with Spring Boot on Tuesday, 9/16/14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for next week's webinar Microservices with Spring Boot with Josh Long. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html.
Webinar Date: Tuesday, September 16, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, UTC+1) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=669463925>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 669 463 925 Thank you,
